skill.name: email-notify
skill.description: Send SMTP email notifications after Codex completes a task. Use when one Codex or Claude run is finished, or when you need to notify on task completion with device name, project name, status, and summary via email.
skill.summary: Send SMTP email notifications after Codex completes a task. Use when one Codex or Claude run is fini...
skill.author: caopulan

security_audit.summary: This skill is a straightforward SMTP email notification utility. It reads environment variables for SMTP configuration, reads AGENTS.md for optional project name extraction, and sends task completion notifications via standard Python smtplib. All detected patterns are expected functionality - email sending is the stated purpose, environment access is for configuration, and filesystem reads are for project name resolution. No malicious behavior confirmed.

content.value_statement: You need to know when your AI assistant finishes important tasks. This skill sends email notifications with device name, project name, status, and result summary directly to your inbox.
actual_capabilities: Send SMTP email notifications with task completion status
Include device name, project name, and summary in emails
Read project name from AGENTS.md configuration
Support TLS and SSL email encryption
Dry-run mode for testing without sending emails
limitations: SMTP server credentials must be configured manually
No real-time interactive responses, only notifications
Cannot receive or process incoming emails

use_cases.title: Monitor automated pipelines
use_cases.description: Get notified when automated coding tasks complete on remote servers or CI/CD pipelines.

use_cases.title: Track long-running builds
use_cases.description: Receive email alerts when complex refactoring or code generation tasks finish on your machine.

use_cases.title: Oversee multiple projects
use_cases.description: Stay informed about task completion across different projects without checking each one manually.

prompt_templates.title: Basic notification
prompt_templates.prompt: Use skill email-notify to send an email when this task is finished. Task title: 'Code refactoring complete', Status: success, Summary: 'Refactored 15 files with improved type hints.'

prompt_templates.title: Failure alert
prompt_templates.prompt: If the build fails, use email-notify to alert the team. Task title: 'Build failed', Status: failed, Summary: 'Compilation errors in 3 modules due to missing dependencies.'

prompt_templates.title: Multi-recipient
prompt_templates.prompt: Notify the entire team on task completion using email-notify. Task title: 'Weekly report generated', Status: success, Summary: 'Generated 25-page report with performance metrics and recommendations.'

prompt_templates.title: Dry-run test
prompt_templates.prompt: Test the email notification setup by running email-notify in dry-run mode. Task title: 'Test notification', Status: success, Summary: 'This is a test message to verify SMTP configuration.'

output_examples.input: Send notification with task title 'Code review complete', status 'success', and summary 'Reviewed 12 pull requests, approved 8 with comments, requested changes on 4'
output: Summary: Reviewed 12 pull requests, approved 8 with comments, requested changes on 4

output_examples.input: Alert the team that the build failed with summary 'Test suite failed: 23 tests failed, 156 passed'
output: Summary: Test suite failed: 23 tests failed, 156 passed

best_practices: Configure SMTP settings in shell profile for persistent environment variables
Use separate email accounts for notifications to protect primary credentials
Test with dry-run mode before relying on notifications for important tasks
anti_patterns: Including secrets or sensitive data in the task summary field
Using personal email credentials for automated notifications
Skipping the dry-run test when first configuring the skill

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Add the instruction to your AGENTS.md file to enable it.

faq.question: What SMTP settings are required?
faq.answer: You need host, port, from address, and to addresses. Username and password are optional for unauthenticated servers.

faq.question: Can I send to multiple recipients?
faq.answer: Yes, separate multiple email addresses with commas or semicolons in the CODEX_EMAIL_TO environment variable.

faq.question: Is my data sent to third parties?
faq.answer: No, emails go directly to your configured SMTP server. No data is collected or stored by this skill.

faq.question: Why is my notification not sending?
faq.answer: Check that all required environment variables are set, verify SMTP credentials, and try dry-run mode to debug configuration issues.

faq.question: How is this different from other notification skills?
faq.answer: This skill uses plain SMTP for maximum compatibility with any email provider, requiring no external API keys or cloud services.
